resources.string: Your rating will help us to do better.
That\'s not the experience we\'d like you to have. Please share your feedback below.
Uh oh! Could you tell us more about what we could improve?
Thanks for your Feedback, is there something specific that you think we could improve?
Thank you! your feedback inspires us to improve. Would you mind giving us a 5?
Thanks! Your awesome feedback just made our day! please rate us on Play Store.
